WHAT A DISCOURTEOUS CLINIC! My appointment was at 10am but when I reached there at 9:58am, no one there. At 10am, No one appears and clinic had no light on. Called clinic and customer center few times, no one picked up.
1020am, received a call from customer center and said will check with Marine Parade clinic.
Afterwords, received a message from customer center at 10:24am said wait for another 10min. At this point, no apology from the clinic nor their customer service.

Subsequently received a call again from customer service said go to the clinic and press the door bell. Also told me that they were there since 10am which is untruth.

Their customer service lack of sincerity and no unrepentant to be late. Unfortunately I did not receive their service so I can‚Äôt judge their treatment skills, but if you‚Äôre a on time person, don‚Äôt waste your time here.

Amazing experience with Dr. Cheak as usual! She is incredibly attentive to my skin needs and I feel completely at ease knowing she‚Äôs the one doing my treatments - super gentle too!

The staff also all super friendly and welcoming without any pushy sales tactics, or hard-selling which I really love.

Highly recommend anyone to come here for their treatments! 5 stars for their exceptional service!

Absolutely amazing experience with Dr. Cheak and her team! They are incredibly meticulous and genuinely care about your skin's health. My acne scars have significantly improved and lightened, and I've had far fewer breakouts since starting treatment here. Highly recommend to anyone looking for compassionate and effective skin care!

I came to 8 Medical Aesthetics clinic initially for simple acne treatment but was then convinced by the entire clinic: doctor Cheak and the clinic nurses for their attention, dedication and professionalism. Doctor treatment plan is very thorough and holistic and not at all pushing for high value procedures but to put my skin desired outcome 1st. Super happy with the results and i am now a frequent customer

Dr Cheak is amazing . She is very precise & professional. Explains my skin condition clearly & treats my skin problems carefully too. I see huge improvement on my complexion & my stubborn sun spots n pigment has been cleared after several laser sessions. Overall service was excellent. Recommended üëçüëç
